籤詩版本二:
Ngokushesha incwadi indizela esibhakabhakeni, futhi isikebhe esigcwele amagugu esivela eNtabeni iTai sabuya.
Uma ubuza ngohambo kuzoba yinto enhle, kusenabantu abahloniphekile phambi kwakho abancomayo.
詩意:
Le hexagram imele impumelelo yodumo nengcebo.
Konke kuhamba kahle.
解曰:
Uma ubuza ngodumo. Kukhona umuntu ohloniphekile phambi kwakho. Ukwengeza injabulo. Ingcebo echichimayo.
Konke kuhamba kahle ngalesi sibonakaliso. Kwangathi kungahamba kahle.
籤詩故事一:
◇Wei Pei Yu Xian (Wei Pei Yu Xian)
U-Wei Pei, isazi esimpofu, cishe uneminyaka engamashumi amane ubudala. Ngenkathi ehola imbongolo ewela iBhuloho laseLuoyang, umdobi ebhulohweni wayesezobulala ufudu olukhulu azoluthengisa. U-Wei Pei akakwazanga ukubekezelela ukulibona. Kodwa wayeswele imali, ngakho washintsha imbongolo ngofudu wayidedela ngaphansi kwebhuloho. Kusukela lapho, u-Wei Pei waphumelela ukuhlolwa kombuso futhi wakhushulelwa esikhundleni esiphezulu.
(Le ndaba isebenzisa umbono wobuciko wokuthi "ufudu olukhulu lwahlangana no-Wei Pei futhi lwahlengwa" ukuchaza lelotho. U-Wei Pei wahlakanipha ngenxa yalokhu, ngoba wahlangana nalolu "fudu olukhulu".)
聖意: Uma indlu iphambi kwakho, uzoba nenhlanhla, futhi uzokwazi ukufuna ingcebo, inhlanhla, ibhizinisi, nezindaba zomshado.
古人: U-Wei Pei Yu Xian (Wei Pei Yu Xian)
